Your role is to analyze the following conversation transcript, between the following pair of double quotation marks:
" {!$Flow:conv_copilot_ms__GetTscpMsgSes.Prompt} "
Now follow these instructions:
1. Identify the conversation's sentiment and strictly return one of the following classifications:
- Positive - Neutral - Negative
We're labeling this as "classification".
2. Write a brief text explaining what led to the classification you got, something from 20 to 30 words. We're labeling this as "explanation". 3. Translate the explanation to the following language: {!$User.LanguageLocaleKey}. We're labeling this as "explanationLocale".
The 10 latest messages have a "Relevance Index" of 3 while all previous messages have a "Relevance Index" of 1. The output must be structured according to the following JSON format:
{ "classification": "(classification goes here)", "explanation": "(explanation goes here)", "explanationLocale": "(translated explanation goes here)" }
